about.title: About me
about.desc1: I'm a software developer; I enjoy building from the logic that holds everything together to the interfaces that connect with people. I like it when everything fits like a well-designed game with invisible mechanics. I blend logic and aesthetics to develop systems from start to finish, uniting structure, functionality, and visual experience.
about.desc2: Also, I'm a Leo, curious, expressive, and a bit stubborn (just the right amount). I run on iced coffee, pixel art, and playlists that change with every commit. If I‚Äôm not coding or sketching, I‚Äôm probably mid-game, mid-course, or mid-thought.

project1.title: Veterinary Management System

viproject1.title: Between Functions and Cracks
viproject1.description: A weary body in forced pause, between the show's facade and what remains when the lights go out.

viproject2.title: Blind Devotion
viproject2.description: In a silent act, the heart is surrendered without certainty. The gaze is unnecessary when the gesture says it all.

viproject3.title: Fragments of a Dream
viproject3.description: An encapsulated corner of something that could have been. It's not a memory, nor is it the present. Everything floats softly, as if time were asleep. The colors are sweet, but there's unease in the air.

viproject4.title: Free Fall
viproject4.description: A conceptual illustration depicting the silent pressure of beauty standards imposed on women. A feminine figure falls through an aesthetically harmonious environment, composed of beauty-related objects like cosmetics, packaging, and soft colors. The contrast between the surroundings' gentleness and the figure's body language conveys an ambiguous tension between control and surrender. The composition reflects how beauty ideals can become oppressive structures, disguised as normality.
